title: add support for amazon s3 to glacier archival and retrieval
body:
hello,  

would it be possible to introduce support for the amazon s3 "lifecycle management" into owncloud? specifically, object archival (transition objects to the glacier storage class) <http://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazons3/latest/dev/object-archival.html>. i think it would be useful if a user uploads data to their amazon s3 bucket, where there is a policy to move data from s3 to glacier for archival, then owncloud would allow the user to request the data to be made available from glacier (if it was moved to it). 

also, a message notifying the user about the status of the data (standard s3 or archived glacier) would be awesome. currently, if you click on your s3 files, you get a zero byte download and no warning that you would need to make an api call to request a copy of the file and wait ~4 hours. 

here's a doc on retrieving data from glacier <http://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazons3/latest/dev/restoring-objects.html>. 

thanks!
